extendedInfo.description: EMG and Minute Loans offer fast, easy, and convenient loans up to $5,000.   Itâs never been easier to get the money you need today.  The range of products and services we offer have been carefully designed to ensure weâre able to supply customers with a full scope of options based on their individual needs.  Consumer LoansWe believe consumers deserve access to the short-term financial solutions needed to address life's unexpected dilemmas. We offer a variety of cash alternatives to provide customers financial assistance when other alternatives are unappealing.Installment LoansMinute Loan Center offers personal loans up to $5,000, within just minutes after a credit line is established. Take as little or as much as you need. As your loan is paid down, your eligibility to borrow additional funds goes up.  Payment plans are flexible as you choose when and how much payments are based on your pay cycle, and lifestyle needs. The faster a balance is paid down, the less interest accrues. There are no minimums or set payment cycles, and there is no penalty for early pay off.Cash in 30 MinutesWhen emergencies arise and there's no time to leave the house, EMG's online partner, Cashin30Minutes.com can get cash IN your bank account FAST!  Simply log on and complete a short questionnaire to determine your loan amount.  Funds will be delivered directly into your account within just minutes.  Get cash now at www.Cashin30Minutes.com.
